docs.snippet: From the International Herald Tribune archives: The State Department lifts a “moral embargo” against the Soviet Union in 1941....
docs.abstract: From the International Herald Tribune archives: The State Department lifts a “moral embargo” against the Soviet Union in 1941.

docs.snippet: A senior diplomat from France, which has been helping moderate Syrian opposition groups prepare for talks with the Syrian government, insisted on Thursday that a grouping created in Riyadh last month must form the opposition delegation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior diplomat from France, which has been helping moderate Syrian opposition groups prepare for talks with the Syrian government, insisted on Thursday that a grouping created in Riyadh last month must form the opposition delegation.

headline.main: French Diplomat Rules Out Russia-Backed Delegation at Syria Talks
headline.print_headline: French Diplomat Rules Out Russia-Backed Delegation at Syria Talks

docs.snippet: Russian warships equipped with an array of long-range missiles cruise off Syria's coast to back the air campaign in Syria and project Moscow's naval power worldwide....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian warships equipped with an array of long-range missiles cruise off Syria's coast to back the air campaign in Syria and project Moscow's naval power worldwide.

headline.main: Russia Displays Naval Might Off Syria's Mediterranean Coast
headline.print_headline: Russia Displays Naval Might Off Syria's Mediterranean Coast

docs.snippet: Barclays is closing investment banking units in Australia and Russia, as well as Asian countries such as Indonesia and Thailand, as part of a review of global operations, it said in an internal memo to staff on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barclays is closing investment banking units in Australia and Russia, as well as Asian countries such as Indonesia and Thailand, as part of a review of global operations, it said in an internal memo to staff on Thursday.

headline.main: Barclays Closing Investment Banking Units in Australia, Russia: Memo
headline.print_headline: Barclays Closing Investment Banking Units in Australia, Russia: Memo

docs.snippet: Britain is considering taking further action against Russia after an inquiry found Russian President Vladimir Putin probably approved the murder of ex-KGB agent Alexander Litvinenko, a spokeswoman for Prime Minister David Cameron said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain is considering taking further action against Russia after an inquiry found Russian President Vladimir Putin probably approved the murder of ex-KGB agent Alexander Litvinenko, a spokeswoman for Prime Minister David Cameron said.

headline.main: UK Considering More Action Against Russia Over Litvinenko: PM's Spokeswoman
headline.print_headline: UK Considering More Action Against Russia Over Litvinenko: PM's Spokeswoman

docs.snippet: Russia and others are trying to undermine negotiations on a solution for the conflict in Syria by including groups such as the Syrian Kurdish YPG militia, Turkish Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said on Thursday....

headline.main: Turkish PM Says Russia Trying to Undermine Syria Negotiations
headline.print_headline: Turkish PM Says Russia Trying to Undermine Syria Negotiations

docs.snippet: Russia's AIDS epidemic is at a dangerous tipping point after the number of people registered HIV-positive passed the 1 million mark, the country's top AIDS specialist said on Thursday, warning the rate of infection had reached record levels....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia's AIDS epidemic is at a dangerous tipping point after the number of people registered HIV-positive passed the 1 million mark, the country's top AIDS specialist said on Thursday, warning the rate of infection had reached record levels.

headline.main: Russia at AIDS Epidemic Tipping Point as HIV Cases Pass One Million-Official
headline.print_headline: Russia at AIDS Epidemic Tipping Point as HIV Cases Pass One Million-Official

docs.snippet: The Russian government is leaning toward a new rescue plan for the troubled VEB state development bank that would cost no more than $2.4 billion this year, a fraction of previous estimates, two officials involved in the discussions have told Reute...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Russian government is leaning toward a new rescue plan for the troubled VEB state development bank that would cost no more than $2.4 billion this year, a fraction of previous estimates, two officials involved in the discussions have told Reuters.

headline.main: Exclusive: Budget Strains Force Russia to Shrink Rescue Plan for State Bank VEB
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Budget Strains Force Russia to Shrink Rescue Plan for State Bank VEB

docs.snippet: Dubai-based port operator DP World and the Russian Direct Investment Fund say they are launching a joint venture to develop ports, transportation and logistics infrastructure in Russia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dubai-based port operator DP World and the Russian Direct Investment Fund say they are launching a joint venture to develop ports, transportation and logistics infrastructure in Russia.

headline.main: Dubai's DP World, Russian Fund Form Ports Joint Venture
headline.print_headline: Dubai's DP World, Russian Fund Form Ports Joint Venture

docs.snippet: Marina Litvinenko called for sanctions and a travel ban against President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia and the former head of the country’s spy service, who, a British inquiry said, “probably approved” the killing of her husband....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marina Litvinenko called for sanctions and a travel ban against President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia and the former head of the country’s spy service, who, a British inquiry said, “probably approved” the killing of her husband.
